    Create an OperationalString from an Exertion.
    Author:
    Dennis Reedy

    • Method Detail

      • create

        public static Map<Deployment.Unique,List<OperationalString>> create(Exertion exertion)
                                                             throws Exception
        Create OperationalStrings from an Exertion.
        Parameters:
        exertion - The exertion, must not be null.
        Returns:
        An Map of Deployment.Type keys withList values composed of services created from {@link ServiceSignature}s. If there are no services, return and empty {@code Map}.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if the exertion is null.
        Exception - if there are configuration issues, if the iGrid opstring cannot be loaded
